Figure 2 shows both the details of the released cumulative emissions in the historical period and the ones allocated by the MCJ in the future, allowing a comparison to be made. In the figure, three groups of countries are distinguished: those that should address the future with a significant reduction of their emissions with respect to the historical cumulative; those who can produce an emissions budget similar to the one emitted in the historical period; and those who can have higher cumulative emissions than the ones from the historical period. Fig. 2
Comparative of the cumulative emissions in the historical period 1994–2017 (upper pie-chart) and the cumulative emissions allocated by the MCJ in the 2018–2100 period (lower pie-chart) for the Mediterranean countries
